heading: Adrenaline Chess
description: adds power ups to chess. (2 players, chess set, and checkers set)

heading: Neighbour Chess Solitaire
description: moves pieces using their neighbours' moves to form one connected group. (1 player, chess set, and deck of cards)

heading: Cloak and Dagger Chess
description: is a game where you disguise your chess pieces as checkers, then try to identify your opponent's pieces. (2 players, chess set, checkers set, pen, and tape)
